name: bulky waffle hat
sizes_available: child, small adult, medium adult, large adult (xl or slouchy fit)
notes:
this is a quick and simple, bulky weight hat design for charity use.  the hat is designed to be long enough to cover the ears in harsh weather.  

this pattern will work well with any bulky weight yarn, as well as worsted weight yarn doubled.  solid, variegated, color-changing - all yarns work well with this basic design.  use your imagination to combine your yarns to equal a bulky weight and create a one-of-a-kind treasure.
